Package datasets

Class DenseMatrixSet<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • datasets.DenseMatrixSet<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    I2DDataSet<IVector<T>>
    public class DenseMatrixSet<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements I2DDataSet<IVector<T>>
    Represents a dense matrix set.
